function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proliferation of emergency measures during crisis","Impact":"Potential for increased urban inequality and splintering of access and affordability fault lines","Mitigation":"Ensure equitable access to emergency measures and resources, address affordability issues, and consider the impact on urban equality","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying unequal access, mobile applications for equitable distribution of resources","People":"Urban citizens, especially those in vulnerable communities","Owner":"Local government and community organizations"},{"Description":"Risk-literate urban citizenry leveraging crisis-information repositories for long-term impact","Impact":"Unequal access to crisis information and potential for limited knowledge dissemination among urban communities","Mitigation":"Promote educational initiatives for risk literacy, ensure equitable access to crisis-information resources, and provide training on crisis response","Technologies":"Online educational platforms, data visualization tools for information dissemination","People":"Urban citizens, educational institutions, community organizations","Owner":"Educational institutions, local government"}]}
